name: mem0
title: Mem0
description: Mem0 is an intelligent memory layer enabling personalized, adaptive, and continuously improving interactions by remembering user preferences and context.
author: dev_khant

commands.name: search-memories
commands.title: Search Text Snippet
commands.subtitle: Mem0
commands.description: Search through your text snippets and get concatenated results

preferences.name: defaultUserId
preferences.title: Default User ID
preferences.description: Default user ID for memory operations

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
